front.extra:
PRAYER: Petition under Article 226 of the Constitution of India
seeking issuance of a writ of Certiorarified Mandamus calling for the
records of the 2 nd respondent with reference to his order in Na. Ka.
V2. 86588/2013, dated 5.8.2013, quash the same and direct
respondents 1 to 6 to remove the encroachments made by
respondents 7 to 12 in Survey No.143/12 to an extent of 0.22.5
hectares in Ellappanpettai Mathura Muthukrishnapuram Village,
Kurinjipadi Taluk, Cuddalore District and cancel the pattas issued to
respondents 7 to 12.

Addl. Government Pleader
for respondents 1 to 6
